name: Roasted Asparagus with Sea Salt and Parmesan
author: Diamond Crystal Salt
summary: Roasted asparagus makes a simple yet elegant side dish on any holiday table, but is just as easy and delicious for a weeknight family meal!
ingredients: 1 pound asparagus spears, trimmed and cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces
½ teaspoon Diamond Crystal® Coarse Sea Salt
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Place asparagus pieces in large bowl
Add Parmesan cheese, butter, garlic, black pepper, Diamond Crystal® Coarse Sea Salt, lemon juice, and lemon zest
Transfer asparagus to baking dish in a single layer
Bake until asparagus is tender and beginning to brown, stirring occasionally, about 15 minutes
